Zhibin Qiu     邱智斌

I am a master student in Computer Science at Xinjiang University advised by Prof. Hao Huang. I am very interested in generative models, especially the recent diffusion models, consistency models, and my research is exploring the application of generative methods to speech signal processing.

I was a visiting researcher at Tsinghua university working with Prof. Fuchun Sun for one year.

E-Mail | Google Scholar | Github
